text: Helga María Sista (born 12 May 1947) is an Argentine alpine skier. She competed in two events at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Argentina Category:Alpine skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Munich
title: Helga María Sista
